law.catch_line: It is the policy of this State that:...
law.text:
It is the policy of this State that:
An individual who has a mental disorder and who is placed in a private group home have, as far as possible, an opportunity for placement in a residence in the community of origin of the individual; and
To assure, as far as possible, that a community will accept a private group home, the private group home should be located:
After consultation with the local government; and
In a manner consistent with the principles of normalization and statewide standards.
